channel.title: I need the model for a Skill Cape(RuneCrafting)
channel.description:
OK,well im sorta new to Moparscape and i looked for awhile where to post this,so if im wrong please tell me the place where i can go to get the help i need.
Im making a SkillCape for my friend because hes making his own Custom Stat,and he asked me to make the skillcape and icon for it,But i need the Runecrfafting skill cape model so i can get started.If i posted in wrong section,im sorry,again, :P lol.
Well i hope someone can help me.
Edit:I looked through 20k Files plus,so idk if i missed it or something but if someone can help me it would be GREAT!sorta like frostflakes and all but not as good as Frosted Flakes.
Morshier,
